"とりあえず手始めにフォンガルフを

"If you perform attacks, Photon Arts, Techniques and other special moves with good timing, they become more powerul. This is called a \"Just Attack\". Not only do Just Attacks deal more damage, they also cause certain enemies to stagger more than usual.

To make an attack a Just Attack, you must use it after another attack. After you perform any attack, a red ring will appear around your body. If you time your next attack to the appearance of that red ring, it will become a Just Attack."
